mapper.sql: task_id, task_name, task_type, task_status, task_publisher, task_classify, task_accepter, task_des, task_file, task_start, task_end, task_money, opr, opr_time, other, others
mapper.select: select a.*, b.key_name as taskTypeName, c.key_name as taskStatusName, d.talents_name as taskPublisherName, e.talents_name as taskAccepterName, f.c_name as taskClassifyName from task_info a left join dics_info b on a.task_type=b.key_value and b.dics_code='TYPE' left join dics_info c on a.task_status=c.key_value and c.dics_code='TASKSTATE' left join talents_info d on a.task_publisher=d.code left join talents_info e on a.task_accepter=e.code left join category_info f on a.task_classify=f.c_code where a.task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into task_info (task_id, task_name, task_type, task_status, task_publisher, task_classify, task_accepter, task_des, task_file, task_start, task_end, task_money, opr, opr_time, other, others,code) values (#{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taskStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taskPublisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskClassify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskAccepter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{taskEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{taskMoney,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{opr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oprTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{other,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{others,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into task_info
task_id,
task_name,
task_type,
task_status,
task_publisher,
task_classify,
task_accepter,
task_des,
task_file,
task_start,
task_end,
task_money,
opr,
opr_time,
other,
others,
code,
#{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{taskType,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update task_info
task_name = #{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
task_type = #{taskType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
task_status = #{taskStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
task_publisher = #{taskPublisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
task_classify = #{taskClassify,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
task_accepter = #{taskAccepter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
task_des = #{taskDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
task_file = #{taskFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
task_start = #{taskStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
task_end = #{taskEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
task_money = #{taskMoney,jdbcType=FLOAT},
opr = #{opr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
opr_time = #{oprTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
other = #{other,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
others = #{others,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where code = #{code}

update task_info set task_name = #{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_type = #{taskType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, task_status = #{taskStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, task_publisher = #{taskPublisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_classify = #{taskClassify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_accepter = #{taskAccepter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_des = #{taskDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_file = #{taskFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_start = #{taskStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, task_end = #{taskEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, task_money = #{taskMoney,jdbcType=FLOAT}, opr = #{opr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opr_time = #{oprTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, other = #{other,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, others = #{others,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
